notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: X.P., C.Y. and L.H. carried out the animal experiments and performed the laboratory work. Z.F., Y.L. and Y.H. performed the statistical analysis. S.X., B.F., J.L., D.W. and L.C. conceived and designed the experiment. L.C. and X.P. wrote the paper. All authors critically reviewed the manuscript for intellectual content and gave final approval for the version to be published.
